title: stuck at 60 fps after windows 10 update
body: Before a windows 10 update I was running atleast 100 fps now im just stuck at 60 fps and I don't really know the reason why but I tried the method to turn the xbox thing off I'm still stuck at 60 fps so if anyone has any solutions pls tell me

replies.body:
i think i figured this out, ive had the same problem too after being forced to update my windows. 

you have to go to the league of legends.exe file (type in "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln" in the search bar then keep on clicking on the folders until you get to "league of legends")..... and right click > click on properties > select compatibility > change to windows 8 or whichever. 

this worked for me, and now my fps is back to normal.

That was a good first step checking for that Xbox Game Bar! Sometimes it can cause some pretty weird fps issues with some games, and those pesky Windows updates seem to keep turning it back on -_-'.

There might be a missed driver update somewhere that's causing those fps drops, so make sure to check for those. Also, check out the rest of the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) in case the main issue lies elsewhere. Test out those changes in a custom game and let me know if it doesn't help!
well, I tried some of the methods but its still not working the game is stuck at 60 fps and its really choppy, it's really annoying and it also effects my game play

Check up on your in-game settings like Lucrativic mentioned and make sure your frames aren't capped out. If they're uncapped already, reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for a little more in-depth troubleshooting!
aww i cant even do that because i dont remember my email and i have to have a verified email, why is this so complicated e.e cant i just not have my fps capped at 60

After the new client, my frames dip down to like 4fps. Before on the old client, i'd get solid 60 and have no issues, any hopes for letting players like me keep that old client? I'd love to play league but I just can't.
You should check your setting in-game and check if it's capped out at 60 FPS so that you can change the settings.
